mil.nga.giat.geowave.accumulo.query

Class AbstractAccumuloRowQuery<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • mil.nga.giat.geowave.accumulo.query.AccumuloQuery
      • mil.nga.giat.geowave.accumulo.query.AbstractAccumuloRowQuery<T>
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AccumuloRowIdQuery, AccumuloRowPrefixQuery

    public abstract class AbstractAccumuloRowQuery<T>
extends AccumuloQuery
    Represents a query operation by an Accumulo row. This abstraction is re-usable for both exact row ID queries and row prefix queries.
